Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar

Class TileShape

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar.PolylineShape
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar.TileShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Area, ConvexShape, Shape, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegularTileShape, Simplex
public abstract class TileShape extends PolylineShape implements ConvexShape, Serializable
Abstract class defining functionality for convex shapes, whose borders consists of straight lines.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • border_line

      public abstract Line border_line(int p_no)
      Returns the p_no-th edge line of this shape for p_no between 0 and edge_line_count() - 1. The edge lines are sorted in counterclock sense around the shape starting with the edge with the smallest direction.
      Specified by:
      border_line in class PolylineShape

    • border_line_index

      Returns the content of the area of the shape. If the shape is unbounded, Double.MAX_VALUE is returned.

      Specified by:
      contains in interface Area

    • contains

      public boolean contains(FloatPoint p_point, double p_tolerance)
      Returns true, if p_point is contained in this shape with tolerance p_tolerance. p_tolerance is used when determing, if a point is on the left side of a border line. It is used there in calculating a determinant and is not the distance of p_point to the border.

    • side_of_border

      public Side side_of_border(FloatPoint p_point, double p_tolerance)
      Returns Side.COLLINEAR if p_point is on the border of this shape with tolerance p_tolerence. p_tolerance is used when determing, if a point is on the right side of a border line. It is used there in calculating a determinant and is not the distance of p_point to the border. Otherwise the function returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT if p_point is outside of this shape, and Side.ON_THE_RIGTH if p_point is inside this shape.

    • contains_on_border_line_no

      public int contains_on_border_line_no(Point p_point)
      If p_point lies on the border of this shape, the number of the edge line segment containing p_point is returned, otherwise -1 is returned.

    • contains_on_border

      public boolean contains_on_border(Point p_point)
      Returns true, if p_point lies exact on the boundary of the shape
      Specified by:
      contains_on_border in interface Shape

      public boolean contains_approx(TileShape p_other)
      Returns true, if this shape contains p_other completely. THere may be some numerical inaccurracy.

    • nearest_border_points_approx

      public FloatPoint[] nearest_border_points_approx(FloatPoint p_from_point, int p_count)
      Returns an approximation of the p_count nearest points to p_from_point on the border of the this shape. The result points must be located on different border lines and are sorted in ascending order (the nearest point comes first).

    • index_of_nearest_corner

      public int index_of_nearest_corner(Point p_from_point)
      Returns the number of a nearest corner of the shape to p_from_point

    • diagonal_corner_segment

      public FloatLine diagonal_corner_segment()
      Returns a line segment consisting of an approximations of the corners with index 0 and corner_count / 2.

    • nearest_relative_outside_locations

      public FloatPoint[] nearest_relative_outside_locations(TileShape p_shape, int p_count)
      Returns an approximation of the p_count nearest relative outside locations of p_shape in the direction of different border lines of this shape. These relative locations are sorted in ascending order (the shortest comes first).

    • shrink

      public ConvexShape shrink(double p_offset)
      Description copied from interface: ConvexShape
      Shrinks the shape by p_offset. The result shape will not be empty.
      Specified by:
      shrink in interface ConvexShape

    • length

      public double length()
      Returns the maximum of the edge widths of the shape. Only defined when the shape is bounded.

    • touching_sides

      public int[] touching_sides(TileShape p_other)
      Calculates, if this Shape and p_other habe a common border piece and returns an 2 dimensional array with the indices in this shape and p_other of the touching edge lines in this case. Otherwise an array of dimension 0 is returned. Used if the intersection shape is 1-dimensional.

    • distance_to_the_left

      public double distance_to_the_left(Line p_line)
      Calculates the minimal distance of p_line to this shape, assuming, that p_line is on the left of this shape. Returns -1, if p_line is on the right of this shape or intersects with the interiour of this shape.

    • side_of

      public Side side_of(Line p_line)
      Returns Side.COLLINEAR, if p_line intersects with the interiour of this shape, Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this shape is completely on the left of p_line or Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this shape is completely on the right of p_line.

    • intersecting_border_line_no

      public int intersecting_border_line_no(Point p_from_point, Direction p_direction)
      Calculates the border line of this shape intersecting the ray from p_from_point into the direction p_direction. p_from_point is assumed to be inside this shape, otherwise -1 is returned.

    • cutout

      public abstract TileShape[] cutout(TileShape p_shape)
      Cuts p_shape out of this shape and divides the result into convex pieces

    • entrance_points

      public int[][] entrance_points(Polyline p_polyline)
      Returns an arry of tuples of integers. The length of the array is the number of points, where p_polyline enters or leaves the interiour of this shape. The first coordinate of the tuple is the number of the line segment of p_polyline, which enters the simplex and the second coordinate of the tuple is the number of the edge_line of the simplex, which is crossed there. That means that the entrance point is the intersection of this 2 lines.

    • cutout

      public Polyline[] cutout(Polyline p_polyline)
      Cuts out the parts of p_polyline in the interiour of this shape and returns a list of the remaining pieces of p_polyline. Pieces completely contained in the border of this shape are not returned.
      Specified by:
      cutout in interface Shape

    • split_to_convex

      public TileShape[] split_to_convex()
      Description copied from interface: Area
      Returns a division of this area into convex pieces.
      Specified by:
      split_to_convex in interface Area

    • divide_into_sections

      public TileShape[] divide_into_sections(double p_max_section_width)
      Divides this shape into sections with width and height at most p_max_section_width of about equal size.

    • is_intersected_interiour_by

      public boolean is_intersected_interiour_by(LineSegment p_line_segment)
      Checks, if p_line_segment has a common point with the interiour of this shape.
